thing-type.label: Freebox Revolution Server
thing-type.description: Provides various informations regarding the status of the Freebox Server

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Freebox Network Address
parameter.description: The IP address / FQDN of the Freebox Server (can include port number)

parameter.name: appToken
parameter.label: Application token
parameter.description: Token generated by the Freebox server

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval in seconds which is used to poll given Freebox Server.

parameter.name: refreshPhoneInterval
parameter.label: Phone Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval in seconds which is used to poll given Freebox Server for phone informations.

channel-type.label: Firmware Version
channel-type.description: Version of the Freebox Server Firmware

channel-type.label: Server uptime
channel-type.description: Time since last reboot of the Freebox Server

channel-type.label: Just restarted
channel-type.description: Has the Freebox server have restarted during the last poll period

channel-type.label: Reboot Freebox
channel-type.description: Reboots the Freebox server

channel-type.label: CPUm Temperature
channel-type.description: Actual measured CPU Marvell temperature of the Freebox Server

channel-type.label: CPUb Temperature
channel-type.description: Actual measured CPU Broadcom (xDSL) temperature of the Freebox Server

channel-type.label: Switch Temperature
channel-type.description: Actual measured switch temperature of the Freebox Server

channel-type.label: Fan Speed
channel-type.description: Actual measured fan speed (rpm) of the Freebox Server

channel-type.label: Screen Brightness
channel-type.description: Brightness level of the screen in percent

channel-type.label: Screen Orientation
channel-type.description: Screen Orientation in degrees

channel-type.label: Forced Orientation
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the screen orientation forced

channel-type.label: Wifi Enabled
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the wifi network is enabled

channel-type.label: xDSL Status
channel-type.description: Status of the xDSL line

channel-type.label: Line Status
channel-type.description: Status of network line connexion

channel-type.label: IP Address
channel-type.description: Public IP Address of the Freebox Server

channel-type.label: Upload Rate
channel-type.description: Current upload rate in byte/s

channel-type.label: Download Rate
channel-type.description: Current download rate in byte/s

channel-type.label: Uploaded
channel-type.description: Total uploaded bytes since last connection

channel-type.label: Downloaded
channel-type.description: Total downloaded bytes since last connection

channel-type.label: On-hook
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the phone is on hook

channel-type.label: Ringing
channel-type.description: Is the phone ringing

channel-type.label: Phone Number
channel-type.description: Callee number for outgoing calls. Caller number for incoming calls

channel-type.label: Duration
channel-type.description: Call duration in seconds

channel-type.label: Timestamp
channel-type.description: Call creation timestamp

channel-type.label: Call Type
channel-type.description: Call Type (ingoing, outgoing, missed)

channel-type.label: Caller name
channel-type.description: Callee name for outgoing calls. Caller name for incoming calls
